name: Jumanjì
description:
Simple, sweet, balanced fruit mix 
Easy ADV material for me as it’s not heavy or over powering even at the high %....it’s just full a rounded. 
Burnt out on custards and cakes? Mix this one up...
If you try it, I'd love comments or reviews. Thanks!

This recipe was tested and designed on the Haku single Clapton at .54ohms at 50W@s2k on ELR
author: s2k

reviews.text: I went looking for a nice and simple Apple recipe for summer. I'm usually disappointed with Apple recipes because I find them too potent and sharp tasting, quickly losing my interest. I decided to take a chance and I mixed it exactly as listed. This blew me away! Right off the shake I realized it was exactly the pure and simple Apple flavour I was looking for! The combo of Double Apple and Two Apples is a winner! It's been 3 days now and it's only getting better. This one is going into my ADV vault. Great work.
